Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.wire

Class WireConnectionDiscoverers

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.wire.WireConnectionDiscoverers
public final class WireConnectionDiscoverers extends Object
Contains wire connection finder and checker implementations for use in BlockNode implementations.

    • sidedWireFindConnections

      @NotNull public static @NotNull Collection<HalfLink> sidedWireFindConnections(@NotNull @NotNull SidedWireBlockNode self, @NotNull @NotNull NodeHolder<BlockNode> holder)
      Finds nodes that can connect to this wire node.

      This is intended for use in BlockNode.findConnections(NodeHolder) implementations.

      Parameters:
      self - this node.
      holder - the node holder for the given node.
      Returns:
      a collection of nodes this node can connect to.
      See Also:
      • BlockNode.findConnections(NodeHolder)

    • sidedWireFindConnections

      @NotNull public static @NotNull Collection<HalfLink> sidedWireFindConnections(@NotNull @NotNull SidedWireBlockNode self, @NotNull @NotNull NodeHolder<BlockNode> holder, @Nullable @Nullable SidedWireConnectionFilter filter)
      Finds nodes that can connect to this wire node.

      This is intended for use in BlockNode.findConnections(NodeHolder) implementations.

      Parameters:
      self - this node.
      holder - the node holder for the given node.
      filter - a general connection filter, used to filter connections, or null if no filter is needed.
      Returns:
      a collection of nodes this node can connect to.
      See Also:
      • BlockNode.findConnections(NodeHolder)

    • sidedWireFindConnections

      @NotNull public static @NotNull Collection<HalfLink> sidedWireFindConnections(@NotNull @NotNull SidedWireBlockNode self, @NotNull @NotNull NodeHolder<BlockNode> holder, @Nullable @Nullable SidedWireConnectionFilter filter, @NotNull @NotNull LinkKeyFactory keyFactory)
      Finds nodes that can connect to this wire node.

      This is intended for use in BlockNode.findConnections(NodeHolder) implementations.

      Parameters:
      self - this node.
      holder - the node holder for the given node.
      filter - a general connection filter, used to filter connections, or null if no filter is needed.
      keyFactory - a link key factory used for creating all the keys for the connections returned.
      Returns:
      a collection of nodes this node can connect to.
      See Also:
      • BlockNode.findConnections(NodeHolder)

    • sidedWireCanConnect

      public static boolean sidedWireCanConnect(@NotNull @NotNull SidedWireBlockNode self, @NotNull @NotNull NodeHolder<BlockNode> holder, @NotNull @NotNull HalfLink link)
      Checks if this wire node can connect to the given node.

      This is intended for use in BlockNode.canConnect(NodeHolder, com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.util.HalfLink) implementations.

      Parameters:
      self - this node.
      holder - the node holder for the given node.
      link - the link that this node could potentially form.
      Returns:
      true if this node can connect to the given node.
